summary: This is an email from Joyce Williams, legal assistant to Judge Edward B. Davis, informing recipients that Judge Davis has selected attorneys Aaron Podhurst and Robert Josefsberg to handle a legal matter, and requesting feedback on the choice. The email is marked confidential and relates to unspecified legal representation.

persons.name: Joyce Williams
persons.context: Author of the email, working for Judge Edward B. Davis and other attorneys at Akerman Senterfitt. She is communicating Judge Davis's choice of legal counsel for an unspecified matter.

persons.name: Edward B. Davis
persons.context: Referred to as 'Judge Davis' and 'the Judge'. He is undergoing foot surgery and has selected Aaron Podhurst and Robert Josefsberg as attorneys to handle a legal matter.

persons.name: Aaron S. Podhurst
persons.context: One of two attorneys (along with Robert Josefsberg) chosen by Judge Davis to handle an unspecified legal matter.

persons.name: Robert Josefsberg
persons.context: One of two attorneys (along with Aaron Podhurst) chosen by Judge Davis to handle an unspecified legal matter.

persons.name: Mia R. Martin
persons.context: Listed as one of the attorneys to whom Joyce Williams provides administrative assistance at the law firm Akerman Senterfitt.

persons.name: Stacy J. Harrison
persons.context: Listed as one of the attorneys to whom Joyce Williams provides administrative assistance at the law firm Akerman Senterfitt.

connections.description: Joyce Williams is the Legal Administrative Assistant to Judge Edward B. Davis.
Judge Davis has selected attorney Aaron Podhurst to handle a legal matter for him.
Judge Davis has selected attorney Robert Josefsberg to handle a legal matter for him.
Both attorneys were selected together by Judge Davis to handle the same legal matter.

events.title: Judge Davis's Foot Surgery
events.description: Judge Edward B. Davis is scheduled to undergo surgery on his foot.

keyFacts: On November 21, 2007, Judge Edward B. Davis selected attorneys Aaron Podhurst and Robert Josefsberg to represent him in an unspecified legal matter.
The communication is a confidential email from Judge Davis's assistant, Joyce Williams, seeking confirmation or disagreement with the choice of counsel.
The document originates from the law firm Akerman Senterfitt and includes standard confidentiality and tax advice disclaimers.
The subject line of the email is 'Epstein', directly linking this communication about legal representation to Jeffrey Epstein.
The nature of the 'matter' requiring legal representation for Judge Davis is not specified in the text.
